Half Life 2, and the other games in the half life series were the most fun story-based first person shooter I have played. Story based first person shooting games aren't usually fun.

What I liked:
+Good Graphics for a game released in 2004
    +It should run on most modern computers since 2004 graphics don't take up much power
+Easy to learn if you have played any other FPS games, because of how the game was designed

What I didn't like:
-There is an extremely rare chance for a small physics error to crash the game, though it most likely never happen to you. It did happen to me once though.
-The game does not autosave often enough, which is why you should quicksave often
-Sometimes, enemies would be a little too challenging

Awesome game. Hit me in all the feels. Spooky at times, thrilling at others. Can't ask for more. 

It has also aged very well.

10/10
10/10, best game experience I've had since the original Half-Life

What can I say that countless other people haven't? This game is fantastic from the characters, to the environments, the lore, designs, everything just works. Half Life 2 has aged quite well and is a game I'd recommend to anyone who has any interest in first person shooters. The gunplay is a bit basic and can feel weak at times but the gravity gun more than makes up for it. I mean why use a Spas 12 or a crowbar when you can launch a harpoon or a car at a bad guy?
This game is why I started playing video games in the first place its a nice balence between fps and puzzler

This game is a lot of fun but the vehicle sections such as Highway 17 stretch on for far too long. The best parts this game has to offer are the atmospheric and exploration based elements over the shooting in my opinion. Would still recommend though because of how massively influential this game was to the industry as a whole.

Definitely a great game. It has great characters and a lot of interesting areas with great gameplay concepts. Gameplay is changed up often with different vehicles and weapons that keep the game from ever getting boring. I just wish they had finished the story.
Nice game. The physics are enjoyable, and sometimes force the player to play around with the environment to achieve what he wants.
Sigo esperando la tercera parte, supongo que la esperanza se acaba cuando me muera...
"Wake up, Mr. Freeman. Wake up, and smell the ashes...."
One of the greatest game franchises from start to finish ive ever played, just wish valve would finish the story.
